QuestData.Title: Bombard the Ballistae
QuestData.Description: At last, our chance to strike at their siege engines! Don't flub it.$B$BI kid.$B$BA little.$B$B$C, bombard New Hearthglen's ballistae with these bombs.$B$BWe'll show the Royal Apothecary Society how it's done old style. No concoctions required!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deathguard Molder at Venomspite has asked you to use the Siegesmith Bombs to bombard 5 New Hearthglen Ballistae.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh happy day!$B$BBy not using the time and resources of the apothecaries to get the job done, I'm sure to attract the attention of the high executor!$B$BThinking outside the box, that's what I'm all about. Yes, yes, you had a hand in helping too.$B$BHere, if I give you something will you promise to not mention your part in all of this?
